Summary As a lead development representative at IBM, I offer viable and appropriate solutions to prospective IBM customers within the UK and Irish markets. 
 
Through the mediums of various social media platforms, customers and prospective clients can obtain solutions and help with their complex technical needs with ease. My goal is to provide the highest standard of engagement and customer care while offering a bespoke ,solution oriented approach to our prospective customers.  
 
I moved to Africa in 2009 to establish a sailing program in Dar Es Salaam and became a founding member of the Tanzanian sailing team, preparing and developing the pioneering squad for the African Games in 2011. When I returned I achieved success in a high pressure call centre environment leading a successful team in increasing productivity for clients and the business alike  
 
I have been working within the field of business development and lead generation. I am target driven and achieve success daily with targets and goals while maintaining close communications with the US and UK markets at director/executive level in order to achieve this. Students can choose from eight undergraduate bachelor's degrees with 102 possible majors, as well as seventeen graduate/doctoral degrees and five professional degree programs (MD, JD, etc.). 
 
UConn's main campus in Storrs is admitting the highest-achieving freshmen in University history. Student diversity continues to increase, as does the number of honors students, valedictorians and salutatorians who consistently make UConn their top choice. It's a great time to be a Husky! Valuing our differences and working together, we embrace camaraderie, compassion, and service to others.
